title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: March 11, 2023, 03:08:49 AMLast edit: July 23, 2023, 06:17:09 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: Hi! Its CC here and I looking for long term partners! Read what I have to "offer" before you reply  I want your bitcoin and buy them for 10% over market price (to start with and we see where it goes) + all fees are on me and always will be.I promise you a smooth, fast & honest transaction. + a friendly partner that never will cause any problem for you.  I trade almost daily for about $100-$500 and looking for honest partners that don´t take $100 and run away, i want somebody that know what long term business is. I have meet so many guys that promise a lot but when they see $100 first time they take it and run away.... instead of making much much more long term. I just don´t understand the stupidity of scammers.- We can use Escrow if you want. (I can also pay the Escrow fee)- Its my personal PayPal account.- Will do trades almost everyday (around $100-$500)- Can do single trades also.So if you think you are the guy, just hit me up.Please with all respect but i don´t trade with PayPal accounts created in africa!Wish you the best.Best regards CC!

comments.author: Moto9999
comments.body: Hey am interested I have a PayPal account and I have btc but what is the rate details let me know when you get this

But wish you all the luck!
